outcome: Branch A: Widespread system glitches spark surreal, existential disruptions in daily life—identity, authority, and basic services become unrecognizable. Paranoia and myth replace trust, spiraling into an atmosphere of chaos and suspicion.

events.description: Thousands find their birth and death records swapped, with infants assigned dead citizens' identities. Hospitals and legal offices are swamped, causing panic over lost inheritance and vanished citizenship.
City loudspeakers begin reciting random names daily at noon, each followed by confusion and fear as some of the named individuals are reported missing or dead within days.

Burial records vanish from public databases overnight, leaving families distraught and fueling conspiracy theories that spiral across social channels. Grieving crowds gather at cemeteries and government offices.
A silent march flows through central Stenograd. Participants wear blank masks and carry empty documents, demanding answers—only to be ignored by city surveillance and officials alike.
